divs: Sighting Details1. Was at hill next to my house, stargazing. 2. Friend pointed it out. 3. I first thought it was a star. 4. It looked like a star, but it was changing color and moving at a slow pace. 5. No change in feeling, reaction, or action. 6. Did not lose sight, it was there for a long time.
Summary: Stargazing with a friend, see shimmering object in distance. It seemed to be moving irregularly at a slow pace.
